#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main(){
int t,i,j;
cin>>t;
int sum[t];
for(i=0;i<t;i++){
int bombs,X,Y;
cin>>bombs;
int x[bombs],y[bombs],dis[bombs];
cin>>X>>Y;
sum[i]=0;
for(j=0;j<bombs;j++){
cin>>x[j]>>y[j];
int g,h;
if(x[j]-X>=0)
g=x[j]-X;
else
g=X-x[j];
if(y[j]-Y>=0)
h=y[j]-Y;
else
h=Y-y[j];
dis[j]=g+h;
sum[i]=sum[i]+2*dis[j];

}
}
for(i=0;i<t;i++){
cout<<sum[i]<<"\n";
}
}
